title: FAKE SIGNALS Directly Download
description:
FAKE SIGNALS is an action hybrid rogue-lite that you sneak in the enemies’ camps , get various weapons and eliminate them. The Lord of the Rings: Gollum
Use weapons such as melee weapons, ranged weapons, throwing weapons, mines, explosive barrel, etc. and defeat enemies. Depending on which weapon you choose and which route you choose, you can have different experiences. Find objects you can hide in. There will be enemies’ weapons. Turn on & off the lights, and you can sometimes destroy them.
Complete missions by using interactive objects such as controllable elevators and doors that open & close. In-car navigation has a lot of information to help you play fake signals. Information is about each stage, weapons, mails from the helper, soundtracks, bonus stages, etc. Some apps can be unlocked by earning coins.
